message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find very valuable. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,250,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,800,000. I believe the product has great potential, but I'm trying to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your position on the price.  While I believe the product offers significant value exceeding your offer, I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle.  How about $2,000,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'd be willing to go up to $1,900,000. Can we meet at that price?
